Preference.android:title: Close All Open Tabs
Preference.android:summary: Close all tabs. Clears out all tabs quickly, or clear any pages causing the browser to crash on open.

Preference.android:title: Clear All Cookies
Preference.android:summary: Clears all cookies stored in relation to this app. Does not clear cookies related to other apps.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Max Tab Count
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Defines the maximum allowable browser tabs that can be open at one time.
